Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory45.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Allen', 3: 'So, President Hassen, would you like to consider my request?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: "We are at war. WGAA is a civilian organization, and as their leader you shouldn't even be here in the command room.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Let alone making requests.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Allen', 3: "It has nothing to do with my business. Or should I say, nothing to do with me, don't you think?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Allen', 3: "I understand it is quite sudden. But it's worth your consideration.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: '...Mr. Allen, I can hardly accept your request without sufficient evidence.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "You're asking to search for a Construct lost years ago in an investigation, in the space station...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "I'm afraid we don't have enough manpower to do so.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Allen', 3: 'We have a girl with great senses in the 2nd Archaeological Team. She was the one who found the hidden data and decrypted it.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Allen', 3: 'Come in, Miss Ayla.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg901_6.jpg'}
{3: 'As the cabin door opens, a fashionable and somewhat special Construct appears.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Greetings, President Hassen. I am Ayla from the 2nd Archaeological Team. I am responsible for the appraisal of artworks.'}
{2: 'Allen', 3: 'And a great young artist in Babylonia, too.'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Oh, I know you... I mean, it's impossible to not know you..."}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "I had the privilege to appreciate a few works of Miss Ayla's. They are very great indeed."}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'I am honored, President Hassen.'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "We don't have much time. Talk about your plan."}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Of course, though I hope you can trust my "senses"...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory45.jpg'}
{3: 'After a brief explanation—'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: "In short, you've been managing to decipher meaningful signals amidst the white noise interferences from the space station.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'And you recently discovered this signal was sent by your friend, a Construct named Selena within the space station.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'And the content of the signal is... dialogues from a play called...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'The Tempest, by Shakespeare.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Operator. Pull a segment of the white noise from the space station and compare it to the parts Ayla mentioned.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Operator', 3: 'There are... a few similarities, true. But the data we can collect is way too little because of the interference...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Operator', 3: 'The chance of it being a coincidence is still very likely.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'The parts I can "hear" is much more than what\'s being recorded here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "I am very certain that this is Selena's voice. And she's still alive.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Looking into Ayla's eyes, Hassen finds an unwavering resolve in her, a sense of maturity that is seemingly at odds with her appearance."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Alright. I believe you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'If that presumably-missing Construct from that mission is still alive, then it is our duty to bring her back.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Allen', 3: 'To protect Ayla, I think that—', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Chairman, only I can sense Selena\'s "voice" for now. Plus, the others in the Archaeological Team all have their ongoing works.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "I think it's sufficient to just send me on this mission.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Allen', 3: "It's not that I don't trust your capabilities to protect yourself...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Allen', 3: "It's just... if you find her only to discover that...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "I understand. I think I'll know what to do.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Allen', 3: "Fine. Then the last question is... who's sending you there?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'About that... Celica.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: 'Understood. Mr. Watanabe, this way, please.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Your meetings are truly as boring and pointless as they seem.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Babylonia has received your terms.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: "Releasing Babylonia's information on the surface to the Forsaken, sharing some of the technologies on the upgraded Inver-Devices... and so on.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "That's right. Not one less.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'I forgot to ask—how are you doing, Watanabe?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I don't think now's the time to catch up.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: "Probably... You're right.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'So, Ayla. The responsibility of escorting you will lie on this ace pilot from the Forsaken.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ayla approaches Watanabe, observing him curiously.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "But I seem to remember that... you're wanted by Babylonia...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'And you still come here to negotiate yourself...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Intriguing.', 4: '1'}
